fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Storyteller: Whenever you open a channel, increase your hand size to 6 for the following phase.
- Conversationalist: Whenever you play 5 or more cards in a phase, learn a random playerâ€™s name who is Order at the end of the phase. Influenceable.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Convince: Choose a player. If they do not win with you, drop their hand size by 1 for the next phase. Influenceable. [2 uses, 2 CD]
- Weave: Choose a player. If they do not win with you, force them to discard 2 random cards at the beginning of the following phase, after they discard. Influenceable. [2 uses, 4 CD]
- Dream: Choose a non-King non-revealed player. If they do not win with you, permanently increase your end of phase draw by 1. Influenceable. [1 use, Unique, UOR3]
